name: 萨马迪·曾德哈斯
name_full: 萨马迪·曾德哈斯 Samadhi Zendejas
introduction: A fixture on the Mexican telenovela circuit for close to 10 years, Samadhi has been performing on screen since she was a child. From commercials to special appearances, she enjoyed an acting and modeling career that culminated in her 2009 telenovela debut in Atrévete a Soñar. For this role she won Premio TVyNovelas' Female Revelation Award in 2010. Since then, she has appeared in short films and numerous telenovelas including, most recently, Telemundo's Mariposa del Barrio, Milagros de Navidad, Enemigo Intimo, Rey del Valle and Falsa Identidad.
